sentences.sentence: Hardening agent and diluent does not affect the role of paint.
sentences.translation: 硬化剂及稀释剂份额不准确将影响漆的作用。

sentences.sentence: Results The recovery rates of each positive control and diluent control were higher than 70%.
sentences.translation: 结果各试验组阳性对照菌的回收率和稀释剂对照组的回收率均达到70%以上。
